org.glassfish.tyrus.websockets

Interface WebSocketRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestContext

    public interface WebSocketRequest
    Request representation.
    Author:
    Pavel Bucek (pavel.bucek at oracle.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Connection getConnection()
      Get Connection.
      String getFirstHeaderValue(String name)
      Get the first header value from the List of header values corresponding to the name.
      String getHeader(String name)
      Return the header values corresponding to the name.
      Map<String,List<String>> getHeaders()
      Get request headers.
      Map<String,List<String>> getParameterMap()
      Return the request parameters associated with the request.

      Get query string.

      Get request path.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeaders

        Map<String,List<String>> getHeaders()
        Get request headers.
        Returns:
        request headers. List items represent headers from HTTP request.

      • getHeader

        String getHeader(String name)
        Return the header values corresponding to the name.
        Parameters:
        name - header name.
        Returns:
        List of header values iff found, null otherwise.

      • getFirstHeaderValue

        String getFirstHeaderValue(String name)
        Get the first header value from the List of header values corresponding to the name.
        Parameters:
        name - header name.
        Returns:
        String value iff it exists, null otherwise.

      • putSingleHeader

        void putSingleHeader(String headerName,
                   String headerValue)
        Put single header value into headers map.
        Parameters:
        headerName - header name.
        headerValue - header value.

      • getRequestPath

        String getRequestPath()
        Get request path.
        Returns:
        request path.

      • setRequestPath

        void setRequestPath(String requestPath)
        Set request path.
        Parameters:
        requestPath - request path to be set.

      • getRequestURI

        URI getRequestURI()
        Get request URI.
        Returns:
        request URI.

      • getQueryString

        String getQueryString()
        Get query string.
        Returns:
        unparsed query string.

      • getConnection

        Connection getConnection()
        Get Connection.
        Returns:
        underlying connection.

      • isSecure

        boolean isSecure()
        Get information about connection secure state.
        Returns:
        true if connection is secure, false otherwise.

      • getParameterMap

        Map<String,List<String>> getParameterMap()
        Return the request parameters associated with the request.
        Returns:
        the unmodifiable map of the request parameters.
